about_the_game:
Hey, Traveler!

Welcome to Etheriia - Travelogue, an adult visual novel where you embark on a thrilling journey through dimensions that I (modestly) messed up. Now it's your job to clean up my mess as you explore sci-fi worlds, medieval kingdoms, and elven lands, all while facing choices, forming relationships, and dealing with a bit of mayhem.

Meet Evelyn, the goddess of temptation and manipulation;

Luna, the thief as elegant as she is dangerous;

And the Warrior, a strong guy, but... let's just say he's not very smart.

Together, we are the most unlikely and chaotic team you've ever met.

And what do you get for solving my chaos?

The chance to live deep and unforgettable romances with beings from completely different worlds. Discover what it's like to love beyond dimensions as your choices shape the fate of these relationships - or destroy them.

The game grows with you. We start with a simple visual style that becomes more impressive and intricate as you progress, perfectly matching the evolution of the story.

Get #Chapter 1 - Supporter Edition in March 2025 and unlock ALL future chapters for free until the release of the Complete Edition.

The Supporter Edition is not only a way to help expand this universe; it's also your ticket to early access and a heartfelt thank you from us.

Supporter Edition Release Schedule and Pricing:

March 2025

Chapter 1 - Supporter Edition - $1.99

Playtime: 30 - 40 minutes

September 2025

Chapters 1 & 2 - $3.99 (Free for Chapter 1 purchasers)

Cumulative Playtime*: 70 - 80 minutes

March 2026

Chapters 1, 2 & 3 - $5.99 (Free for Chapter 1 purchasers)

Cumulative Playtime*: Approximately 2 - 2.5 hours

June ... 2026

Chapters 1, 2, 3, and 4 - $7.99 (Free for those who purchased Chapter 1)

Cumulative playtime*: about 4 - 5 hours

September 2026

Complete Edition (Chapters 1-5) - $14.99 (Free for those who purchased Chapter 1)

Total playtime: about 8 - 10 hours

If you've read this far, that means you're interested. And that's perfect!

So let me explain: in Etheriia - Travelogue, you'll dive headfirst into worlds that I, shall we say, messed up a bit (oops) while balancing interdimensional romance, thrilling adventures, and choices that actually matter.

This isn't your typical "save the world" story. Think sci-fi dimensions filled with futuristic technology, medieval kingdoms filled with political intrigue, and elven lands filled with magic so powerful it seems to have a life of its own. Oh, and Evelyn's gaze? Dangerous in all the best ways.

Trust me, she always gets what she wants.

So, Traveler, are you ready to face Evelyn, accompany Luna, and endure the Warrior? I can't wait to see how you handle this.

Add Etheriia - Travelogue to your wishlist now and dive into this adventure!

Until next time, Traveler,

Aerith (I break universes, Luna breaks hearts, and the Warrior... well, he just breaks things)

#SexualContent #Nudity #Mature #NSFW #VisualNovel #Hentai #Realistic #Romance #Atmospheric #MultipleEndings #Singleplayer #ChooseYourOwnAdventure #Funny #Action #Episodic #Drama #Adventure #Comedy #Indie #Mystery #Casual

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content as follows:
In Etheriia - Travelogue, adult content includes scenes of explicit consensual sex and nudity, with a focus on sensual relationships between characters of different dimensions. Some scenes may involve themes such as
Players should be aware that this is an adult-only game (18+), with content intended for mature audiences, and may not be suitable for everyone due to the themes involved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Distributions based on Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Etheriia - Travelogue is an adult visual novel in which players embark on a sensual journey through diverse universes, including science fiction, medieval and elven, correcting visual flaws and restoring order.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
